fields.name: Skill: Divine Protect
value<text>: • Angel will randomly select a non-Angel friendly unit within range (3) as the target.
• If no target is found, Angel will select the closest non-Angel friendly unit.
• If all friendly units are Angel, all Angels will not move or select a target.
• Angel's skill cool-down is 5 seconds (the first skill release is 5 seconds after the start of the battle).
• With Angel as the center, all friendly units within range (2) will receives evasion buff.
• A friendly unit under the evasion buff has the ability to evade control triggered by normal attack (e.g. Frost Archers’s Chill) but not control triggered by skill (e.g. Aly's fire bomb)
